data.title: Private Mumbai Sightseeing Tour (Traveller's Choice Award Winner)
data.description: Booking our city sightseeing tour is a great way to explore and experience the vibrant city of Mumbai. Our knowledgeable and friendly tour guides, who are Mumbai University students, will take you to the top attractions of the city such as the Gateway of India, Marine Drive, Crawford Market, and many more. You'll also get to see the stunning architecture of the colonial era and learn about the history, culture, and lifestyle of Mumbai. Our tour is conducted in an air-conditioned vehicle to make your experience comfortable and convenient. By booking our city sightseeing tour, you'll have an unforgettable experience and gain a deeper appreciation for the vibrant city of Mumbai.

data.title: Highlights of Mumbai Private Sightseeing Tour:Winner of TRAVELLERS CHOICE AWARD
data.description:
This is a private tour of Mumbai and so we are flexible with the start time. The Recommended start time is 8am or 9am, but if you wish to start early or late, it is possible.

This tour can be customised for tourists who don’t have enough time but want to see the most of Mumbai.

In this tour we offer you a fascinating 'getaway' that gives you a ringside view of the 'madness and magic' of MUMBAI - the living city that 'never sleeps'. The idea behind the tour is for you to experience the city the way locals do, to see Mumbai from an insider’s perspective. We will make sure you experience the real spirit of Mumbai.

Total Tour Duration varies for Different options Selected :
Sightseeing tour (Most Popular) - 6 Hours
Sightseeing tour + Street food - 6 Hours 
City + Dharavi - 7 Hours
City + Elephanta caves : 9 Hours minimum
Mumbai City Tour with Lunch : 7 to 8 hours

data.title: (Mysuru) Mysore Day Out - A Royal Experience Private Tour from Bangalore
data.description:
Perfect day tour for visiting Mysore. Private day tour starts from 7:30 in the morning and continues till evening. Tourists visit the Magnificent Mysore Palace, the legendary Chamundi Hills, Somnathpur Temple & Daria Daulat. 
Mysore beautifully showcases Indian history, how the Wadiyar dynasty ruled Mysore, How it was invaded and what happened to this city after the tragedy.

An epic story filled with Indian culture and history. During the tour, we will make you try Indian cuisine and explore the food joints which have the mesmerizing Indian aroma and make you experience the Indian culture that you would have never seen before!

So are you ready for an Indian history bomb been thrown at you?!

Note:- For this Royal Mysore trip you can choose any one of the options mentioned below:
*Mysore Palace, Dariya Daula, Devaraj Market, Colonel Belly Dungeon.
*Mysore Palace, Sand Museum, Devaraj Market and Chamundi hills.
*Mysore Palace, Sand Museum, Devaraj Market and Somnathpur Temple.

data.title: Elephanta Caves & Island Guided Private Tour
data.description: The Elephanta Caves are situated in Western India on Elephanta Island (also called the Island of Gharapuri), which highlights two hillocks isolated by a tight valley. The little island is dabbed with various old archeological remaining parts that are the sole declarations to its rich social past. These archeological remaining parts uncover proof of occupation from as soon as the second century BC. The stone cut Elephanta Caves were built about the mid-fifth to sixth hundreds of years AD. The most significant among the caverns is the incomparable Cave 1, which estimates 39 meters from the front access to the back. In plan, this cavern in the western slope intently looks like Dumar Lena cave at Ellora, in India. The principal body of the cavern, barring the porches on the three open sides and the back passageway, is 27 meters square and is upheld by lines of six sections each. Elephanta Caves are an UNESCO World Heritage Site.

images.caption: Murti of Lord Shiva in Elephanta caves

data.title: Dharavi slum tour by the 1st female tour guide of Mumbai's slum
data.description: Booking a Dharavi slum tour offers a unique and eye-opening experience for visitors to Mumbai. It provides an opportunity to learn about the culture, lifestyle, and resilience of the people living in one of Asia's largest slums. The tour is guided by local residents who can provide an authentic perspective on life in the slum. Additionally, a portion of the proceeds from the tour goes towards supporting community development projects in the area. By booking a Dharavi slum tour, visitors can gain a deeper understanding and appreciation of the city of Mumbai and it's diverse communities.

data.title: Best of Bollywood Private Tour with Lunch and Transport.
data.description:
Enjoy a 3 hour fun, entertaining & activity packed private tour in an operational Bollywood studio. This tour is special because it is the only Bollywood Tour in Mumbai which is owned & managed by an Actor & Director, Mr. Rahil Khan. Because of this you get an insiders perspective of the industry.

You get a unique experience of watching a live filming of a movie/series/television show from a close distance. You get an opportunity to interact with actors, actresses & crew members & take pictures with them.

You will enjoy watching a one hour live dance show and even participate in it!
(In a comfortable, air conditioned small auditorium)

You will visit the Bollywood mini museum and get to try out various costumes used in popular Bollywood movies. 

You will also visit the sound recording room in the studio & get an opportunity to sing & record your favorite song in any language!

After the studio tour, we take you to a nearby restaurant for a delicious lunch with our friendly guide.

images.caption: Fun times at the Bollywood Tour!

data.title: Private Full-Day Mumbai Sightseeing Tour with Dharavi Slums
data.description: Our guide will pick you up from your hotel or port & then transfer into an air-con car, and the do the whole sightseeing tour and after that do Asia's biggest slum tour where the movie Slumdog Millionaire was filmed. It is an all-inclusive tour with fully guided by a professional English speaking guide. If you have only one day to spend in Mumbai then you are at the right place to see the whole of Mumbai in one day.

data.title: Dharavi, Dhobighat, Dabbawallas & Gateway of India-All inclusive
data.description:
A must do tour of Mumbai. This is an off-beat 4 hour tour where you will see Mumbai from a wide angle, a variety of places to visit with the mode of travelling will be walking and public transport. You will see the historic sites with their relevant Gothic architecture, the cultural side of Mumbai where you will see people offering their prayers and morning rituals, as well as feeding the cows as a kind gesture toward them. You will also take a local train ride, however you need not worry about the crowds as you will be traveling on non-busy routes, A Dharavi guided tour and insider tour of Dhobighat and get to see Dabbawallas at Churchgate(Lunch box Delivery ). It's like serving Mumbai on a plate.

You will be visiting Dhobighat from Inside and not just from Outside

images.caption: Dharavi Tour ( Included in See the Real Mumbai)

data.title: 3-Day Private Taj Mahal, Agra and Delhi Tour from Goa or Mumbai
data.description: A trip to India is considered incomplete without visiting the spectacular monument that lies in Agra, the Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World. This 3-day tour is specially designed for tourists who arrive to enjoy the fascinating beaches of Goa for several weeks, so that they may also have the opportunity to make a pilgrimage to the Taj Mahal and visit other attractions in Delhi and Agra, such as the Agra Fort and Mehtab Bagh. In Delhi, you will have the chance to visit the 11th Century Qutub Minar, built by Qutub-ud-din Aibek of the Slave Dynasty, Humayun's Tomb, the Bahai Temple, also known as the Lotus Temple and the war memorial, India Gate. You will also drive by the Parliament House, the President's Palace and the Secretariat buildings.

data.title: 2-Day Tour to The Taj Mahal, Agra from Mumbai with Both Side Commercial Flights
data.description: Departure Transfer from Hotel to Airport in Mumbai and Pickup from Delhi airport and drive to Agra. Visit Agra Taj Mahal The world's best-known tomb stands testimony to the timeless love story of the 17th century Mughal Emperor, Shah Jahan and his queen Mumtaz Mahal and Agra Fort (A Unesco World Heritage Site), Built by Emperor Akbar in 1565 A.D.

data.title: Ultimate San Sebastian Pintxos & Wine Tour (Evening)
data.description:
In a food mecca like San Sebastian, there are some places you just can’t leave without trying—and we’re going to visit them all tonight. Come with us to San Sebastian’s pintxos headquarters, the Old Town, where we’ve carefully chosen the best bites the city has to offer for you. As we go, we’ll teach you what to do—and what not to do!—so you can successfully navigate the pintxos scene during the rest of your trip.

- Don't miss a thing in a city known for its food—we've selected the best for you!
- Squeeze into a bar that's a San Sebastian institution for locally-caught seafood.
- Learn the unwritten rules of pintxos so you can eat like a pro during the rest of your stay.
- Enjoy classic pintxos in the classic style: standing elbow to elbow in bars packed with locals!
- Conquer all of San Sebastian's must-visit bars in one night.

data.title: San Sebastian Pintxo, Wine & Market Foodie Tour(Small Group)
data.description:
Awarded 2023 Traveler’s Choice Best of the Best #12 Wine Experiences in the World. "Taste the Evolution of the Pintxo through time" with a Native Basque Local Guide. MARKET TASTING is a must! (Saturday noon, Sunday and Monday noon market will be closed so we will offer 2 more Pintxos instead).
San Sebastian is a foodie`s paradise but if you want to find the tastiest food avoiding tourist traps, you need a local guide. Save time by heading straight to the places offering the most delicious local food and best wines. You’ll experience the sights and sounds of the city by foot. 
Eat enough samples and pintxos to fill you for the day (at least!) and learn about Basque culture and cuisine evolution. Earra! (Awesome!)

data.title: The Original Bilbao Food Tour with Wine Pairing
data.description:
Come discover a beautiful city and the amazing Basque cuisine on our 3-hour ‘pintxos’ (Basque tapas) tour of Bilbao. Experience the 700 year old streets of the Old Town with a professional local Basque guide who is an expert in the Bilbao culinary scene. We are the original "Bilbao Food Tour" having pioneered the idea in the city starting in 2014. 

We will visit 5 bars and sample pintxo styles ranging from traditional to modern. Your guide will pair each tasting with an excellent wine that compliments the pintxo. Wines that we recommend include red wine from La Rioja, Txakoli (a lightly sparkling white wine from the Basque Coast), and more!

data.title: Gaztelugatxe, Mundaka and Gernika Tour from Bilbao
data.description:
Join out tour guides and enjoy the best of Bizkaia region. First of all we will make the hike to the hermitage of San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, 241 steps of rock, sea and wind that will take us to enjoy spectacular views.

After returning to the starting point and taking a well-deserved rest, we will go to the charming fishing village of Mundaka, on the west bank of the Urdaibai River estuary, where we can see how the modernity of surfers mixes with the tradition of fishermen. in a villa with a unique appeal.

Finally we're going to take a deep dive into the heart of Basque history by visiting the legendary Gernika tree and the tragic bombing of the village during the Spanish civil war. Picasso´s Gernika portrayal will be visited along the way.

data.title: San Sebastian Pintxo Tasting Paired with Spanish Wines
data.description:
Immerse yourself in the charming and wonderful Parte Vieja (Old Town) of San Sebastian and let yourself be advised to taste the best pintxos in town paired with 5 Spanish wines from different Apellations of Origin, feeling like a donostiarra (native from the city) throughout the whole experience. Taste the best gastronomic art pieces combined with some of the best Spanish wines. 

In between pintxos you will have the chance to discover the whereabouts of this amazing area full of history, getting mixed with the local people through the route that our guides will take you.

data.title: Rioja Wine Tour: 2 Wineries Visit with Tasting from San Sebastian
data.description:
Spain is widely famous for its wines' high quality, and the cradle of these wines, the land that provides its name to the apellation of La Rioja, is not far from San Sebastian. Enjoy visiting two wineries (bodegas), have a relaxing walk through the vineyards, learn the wine-making process from the grape harvest to the aging and finish the experience with a wine tasting in each winery to taste some of the best Rioja wines.  Two different wineries will be visited in order to learn the difference from one winery to the other. 

Along the day we will also visit a charming medieval village, Laguardia.

data.title: Biarritz and French Coast Small Grop Tour from San Sebastian
data.description:
The delights of the French coast can be found close to San Sebastian. Tiny and lovely fishing villages like Saint Jean de Luz (if small-group tour option selected), where time seems to have stopped centuries ago, or nice villages on the beach such as Biarritz where people from all around the world spend their summer enjoying the Basque gastronomy and surf in the same town. Let Bayonne impress you, a charming small city full of historic buildings and a lovely quaint downtown, or visit Hendaye, a town in the border between France and Spain witness of many historical events throughout the last 200 years. 

Do not miss the opportunity to visit the fantastic towns of the Basque French shore while you stay in San Sebastian, and do it with the comfort of having local guides and private transportation from the convenience of your hotel entrance.

data.title: San Sebastian: Authentic Basque Cooking Class in the Old Town
data.description: Experience the traditional cuisine of the Basque Country in a way few other visitors to the city can claim. This comprehensive San Sebastian cooking class, taught by a professional chef in a historic family restaurant, will give you a crash course in the essentials of regional cooking. Get hands-on in preparing four classic recipes: the Spanish potato omelet, cod in pil pil sauce, a delectable steak with red piquillo peppers, and the renowned burnt cheesecake. Throughout your San Sebastian cooking class, you'll learn new skills like how to perfectly flip a Spanish tortilla, gain a deeper appreciation of the city's culinary culture, and unpack the stories behind each dish as you cook. Finally, it's time to sit down to savor the dishes you've prepared with the perfect drink: Basque cider and two glass of wine. Leave with copies of the recipes so you can enjoy these special Basque dishes back at home long after your trip is over.

data.title: The Authentic Bilbao Pintxos, Food & History Tour with a Local
data.description:
All of our guides are basque foodies and want to show you why. They will take you around the city from bar to bar discovering the local food, pintxos, and some local drinks as well. 

You will get to know the history of Basque language and the Basque people, differences between Spain and Basque country and the past and present of Bilbao. We will adapt the route depending on whether you are more eager to walk and see places or if want to try more local foods. You will visit bars and restaurants off the beaten track, avoiding the tourists and experiencing the city like a true local. 

All allergies and dietary restrictions included, we will personalize the tour for your needs.

data.title: Small-Group Electric Bike Tour in San Sebastián
data.description:
San Sebastian has a large network of bike lanes. We have decided to take advantage of them and take you to explore the different districts of the city to see how we, the “donostiarras”, live our day to day life and show you the nicest corners.

Discover the most authentic neighbourhoods of the city thanks to our Orbea electric bikes.
Visit places of interest in the districts that are further away from the touristic areas of the city.
Choose the tour that adapts better to your schedule, in the morning or in the afternoon.
The small size of the group makes the experience more comfortable and safe.

All of our guides are English speaking locals that love and enjoy the city.

data.title: Private Chennai city tour for an immersive cultural experience
data.description:
Chennai city tour is a cultural immersion in the company of a cultural evangelist and an experience of a lifetime. 

Visit the ancient town of Mylapore which used to trade pepper and fine cloth with Rome for gold. Experience mesmerizing rituals in the 7th century temples of Kapaleeswar. Learn the science behind the rituals and role of temple in modern Indian society. 

We also visit  San Thome Basilica to see the relics of St Thomas who came here 2000 years ago. 

The other experience includes  Ramakrishna Math the monastic organization and Fort Saint George which provides a vivid history of how the East India Company came as traders and became the rulers of India.

data.title: 2-Night Private Taj Mahal and Agra Tour from Cruise Port
data.description: Experience this 2-night and 3-days overland adventure that gives you the opportunity to make a pilgrimage to the Taj Mahal, India's most famous architectural wonder. After pick-up from Port you’ll fly to Delhi and driven to the bustling streets of Agra where you’ll see the Taj Mahal at sunrise and sunset. This guided tour gives you insight into Agra, a city famous for its Unesco World Heritage sites which include the Taj Mahal, Agra Fort and Mehtab Bagh Garden. The private tour includes either 5 star and 4 star accommodation (depending on option selected when booking), commercial domestic flights, private car and driver, private local tour guides, breakfast, all entrance fees and bottled water.

data.title: Freeport Shore Excursion: Kayak Turtle Park
data.description: If you have visited the Grand Bahama Island and feel like there is nothing left to see, we now offer day trip shore excursions to Sweeting's Cay, about 4 miles off the east end of Grand Bahama Island. Here, guests are able to spend the day kayaking the mangroves, private beach, and visit the Turtle Park.

data.title: Day Trip to Taj Mahal and Agra from Chennai with Both Side Commercial Flights
data.description: 4am Pickup from Hotel or anywhere in Chennai and drop-off Chennai Airport and Flight to Delhi. Arrival in Delhi Airport and three hours drive to Agra by expressway. First visit Taj Mahal and after Taj Mahal take a Lunch break. Second we visit Agra Fort and some shopping in Agra. After Agra Sightseeing drive back to Delhi and drop at Delhi Airport flight to Chennai. Arrive in Chennai airport and drop at your Hotel or anywhere in Chennai.

data.title: Total Chennai city tour in Private car with guide & lunch by Wonder tours
data.description: Morning you will be picked up from your hotel in Chennai.Spend your day exploring Marina Beach,Chennai's cultural hub of Mylapore Kapaleeshwar Temple and the San Thome Basilica, followed by a traditional South Indian lunch in a local restaurant and visit the shrine at Ramakrishna Math, followed by a visit to the 17th-century Fort Saint George before returning to your hotel.

data.title: Mahabalipuram & Kanchipuram in a day from Chennai by private car with guide
data.description: In this day tour from Chennai, we will visit the twin wonders of Pallava architecture, Mahabalipuram and Kanchipuram. We will cover the magnificent temples of Ekambareswar & Kailashnath in Kanchipuram. After that we visit the ancient sea port of Mahabalipuram and visit the legendary rock cut structures lie Arjuna's penance, Five Rathas and the iconic Shore temple which served literally as the beacon for sea farers from the 8th century onwards. This is a fully guided tour with pick up and drop, private car, full time guide, lunch and all entrance charges as well.

data.title: One-Day Sacred Temples Tour: Chennai to Kanchipuram & Vellore
data.description: Embark on a spiritual odyssey with the "One-Day Sacred Temples Tour: Chennai to Kanchipuram & Vellore," commencing at 6:00 AM from Chennai. Marvel at Kanchipuram, the "City of Thousand Temples," where you'll explore the Kamakshi Amman Temple, known for its exquisite architecture and vibrant festivals. Delve into the grandeur of Ekambareswarar Temple, adorned with a colossal mango tree dating back over 3,500 years, and visit the ancient Kailasanathar Temple, showcasing Dravidian-style architecture. Witness the beauty of Varadharaja Perumal Temple and relish a traditional South Indian lunch. Journey to Vellore to encounter the Golden Temple, a gilded marvel, and explore the historical Vellore Fort with its ancient Hindu temple. Conclude your day at Jalakandeswarar Temple Tank, known for its serene ambiance. Depart from Vellore at 6:00 PM, returning to Chennai by 8:30 PM, carrying cherished memories of a day filled with spiritual enrichment and historical wonders.

data.title: Auroville and Pondicherry Tour from Chennai
data.description:
Drive your way to the amazing experimental township of Auroville, it is a universal city in the making in south-India dedicated to the ideal of human unity based on the vision of Sri Aurobindo and The Mother. And range over the majestic french colonial city of Pondicherry visiting all important attractions of both these city.

• Money-back Guarantee.
• 100% Guest Satisfaction Assured. 
• Includes All Entrance Tickets. 
• Rush free and Comfortable Tour Itinerary.
• All tour carried out by Government Approved Guide with In-depth knowledge of History.
• Traditional Indian Souvenir at Departure.

data.title: Guided tour of Mahabalipuram for an immersive cultural experience
data.description:
Over 3 hours, this guided tour will teleport you to the 7th century into the times of the Pallavas with incredible rock cut monuments. This tour can be done by walk or in your vehicle. We can also arrange a tuk tuk or autorickshaw.
You will experience masterpieces from this world heritage site like the Pancha Rathas which are rock cut monolith temples, Arjuna's Penance the giant open air rock relief, the gravity defying Krishna's butterball and the Shore temple which is the last remaining of the 7 Pagodas mentioned by Marco Polo. 

Mahabalipuram is the proud recipient of world's first stone carving city declaration. However, the next generation of sculptors are moving to the cities for jobs threatening a slow death for this fine art. Our company is helping this community by training & employing local guides and by procuring their wares to strengthen their livelihood.
.

data.title: Chennai Stone or Bronze or Prehistory Museum Walk by a Storyteller with Cab
data.description:
- Led by the Heritage Storyteller,
- 4 dimensional narration that includes archaeological, historical, architectural and mythological wherever required 
- Learn about Egmore Museum, its origin, seeing rich and classic collection of artefacts.
- Understanding sculptors' creativity
